execute:
  echo: false
---


```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| message: false
kills <- read_csv("matchmaking_data/CS_Kills.csv")
```

```{r}
kills_detailed <- kills |>
  group_by(wp) |>  
  summarize(kills = n(),
            average_kills = mean(kills)
            ) |>
  arrange(desc(kills))
kills_detailed
```
